title: WTB: various N172, N28, N300 cards
author: Cmvorce

posts.post_title: WTB: various N172, N28, N300 cards
posts.post_content:
I'm beginning to put my Christmas wish list together. Looking to buy 1 or 2 of the following cards towards the end of November. If you have anything available, please send me a message. My budget limits me to PSA / SGC 1 or the raw equivalent. Thank you in advance! 

N172 Old Judge: Old Hoss Radbourn 
N172 Old Judge: Roger Connor
N172 Old Judge: Jim O'Rourke 
N28 Allen & Ginter: John Montgomery Ward
N28 Allen & Ginter: Tim Keefe
N28 Allen & Ginter: John Clarkson
N300 Mayo Cut Plug: Billy Hamilton
